name: MAYA 2012 - Portal to the New Humanity (Canceled)
blurb: A multi-player video game inspired by the Shaman Don Miguel Ruiz (The Four Agreements) set at the peak of the Mayan civilization.

rewards.reward: Early access to the game as a Beta Tester, \u201cObsidian Key\u201d to the live game for special access to restricted areas and a $20 credit for the in-game marketplace. MAYA 2012 Wallpaper.

Access to Private Website, behind the scenes video series keeping you up to date on our progress and access to a online private discussion community. An E-Book version of The Four Agreements by Don Miguel Ruiz. All previous reward tiers included.

\u201cJade Key\u201d to the live game for special access to restricted areas and $30 credit for the in-game marketplace. \r\nScreensaver with animated countdown calendar to Dec. 21, 2012 and detailed explanations of the meaning of the calendar days. \r\nAn E-Book version of The Four Agreements Companion Book (Using The Four Agreements to Master the Dream of Your Life). All previous reward tiers included.

Official MAYA 2012 T-shirt. (This item is exclusive to the campaign and will be shipped for free in the US. Please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping.) Download of official MAYA 2012 poster. Download of MAYA 2012 Soundtrack (AAC or mp3 - DRM Free.) Download of MAYA 2012 Documentary. All previous reward tiers included.

8X12 First Edition Fine-Art Numbered Print of Original Artwork Panel from the game signed by the artist. Access to the Silver Community Level, where you will be able to submit game enrichment content to be included in the final game if approved, along with credit for the content. Digital version of MAYA 2012 Adventure/Artwork Book (filled with 100+ full color pages of concept art, original photos, developer bios. Excerpts from the game\u2019s script, warrior trainings, and more).  All previous reward tiers included.

Set of four 8x12 First Edition Fine-Art Numbered Prints of Original Artwork Panels from the game signed by the artist. Credit as Associate Producer.  Four of Don Miguel\u2019s books including The 15th Anniversary Illustrated Edition of The Four Agreements. All previous reward tiers included.

Coffee Table Printed Version of MAYA 2012 Adventure/Artwork Book (filled with 100+ full color pages of concept art, original photos, developer bios. Excerpts from the game\u2019s script, warrior trainings, and more). Access to the Gold Community Level which gives you access to monthly Skype meetings with the Awaken Team about the development of the game. Invitation to the Launch Party.  All previous reward tiers included.

Original Fine Art (14x20) that incorporates your face into the game art and signed by the artist. Gold Level Community Access to bi-weekly Skype creative meeting with the team. Online Shamanic Workshop led by Don Miguel\u2019s 15 year associate, Fu-Ding Cheng. Credit as Associate Producer. All previous reward tiers included.

Mayan Symbol "Hunab-Ku" Silver Medallion. Platnum Level Community; Access to studio and face-to-face meetings with the team. In-Person Shamanic Workshop in Los Angeles led by Don Miguel\u2019s 15 year associate, Fu-Ding Cheng. Credit as Executive Producer. All previous reward tiers included.

Shamanic Power Journey to Teotihuacan Temple Complex in Mexico with the MAYA 2012 team (excluding airfare). Or an original commissioned artwork by the MAYA 2012 lead artist.  Credit as Visionary Producer.  All previous reward tiers included.
THERE ARE MORE REWARDS but we can't post them here because they're too big! For premium rewards past a $10,000 pledge, contact us at info@awaken.com
